item.title: Proof of Concept - IceBear Control Using PLC
item.description: WARNING This interface is a proof-of-concept and has not been tested in the field. Controlling an Ice Bearâ€™s make cycle in this way may result in physical damage to the Ice Bear and surrounding structure. Use at your own risk. This interface is subject to change and may not be supported in the future. Quick Summary: An off-the-shelf external controller may be used to interface directly with the CDC controller to control the IceBears’ cycle of Making Ice and Providing Cooling.
